function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adherence to social distancing guidelines","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among individuals in close proximity","Mitigation":"Enforce strict policies and guidelines for social distancing, provide clear communication and education on the importance of social distancing","Technologies":"Tracking and monitoring technology for maintaining distance, communication tools for education","People":"Employees, customers, visitors","Owner":"Management, health and safety representatives"},{"Description":"Inadequate use of safety wearables and carry-ons","Impact":"Greater susceptibility to infection due to lack of protective gear","Mitigation":"Provide easy access to safety wearables, mandate the use of protective gear, regular training on proper use of safety wearables","Technologies":"PPE vending machines, wearable technology for monitoring usage, training and education software","People":"Employees, customers, visitors","Owner":"Health and safety department, management, vendors"},{"Description":"Poor communication and awareness about the virus","Impact":"Increased risk of misinformation, lack of precautions, and potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Implement regular communication strategies, provide accurate information, conduct awareness campaigns and training","Technologies":"Internal communication platforms, digital signage for awareness, training and education software","People":"Employees, management, visitors","Owner":"Communication team, health and safety representatives, management"}]}
